example.text: This bill — HR 2 — would end humanitarian parole for tens of thousands of Afghan evacuees who fought alongside our troops. These heroes and their families barely escaped the Taliban last summer. Less than a year later, Republicans are trying to send them back to die. [[url]]

This week, I met with Panama's Foreign Minister [[user]] to discuss safe, legal pathways for asylum-seekers. As the world grapples with forced migration, the US and Panama need to work together with our neighbors on humane, orderly systems across our hemisphere. [[url]] [[url]]
US-Mexico border sees orderly crossings as new migration rules take effect [[url]] via [[user]]

HR 2 would also end legal protections for tens of thousands of Afghan families who have started new lives in the United States. These folks fought side-by-side with our troops and risked their lives for us. Republicans just voted to send them back to die. 3/5 [[url]]

Looking forward to joining [[user]] at 12:30 PM ET / 11:30 AM CT to talk about building a humane and secure immigration system post-Title 42 + the urgent need for commonsense gun safety laws to stop gun violence and mass shootings. [[url]]
